title: Don’t Help Russia Make It to the Moon
text:
The National Aeronautics and Space Administration is working hard to achieve the Trump administration’s goal of putting U.S. astronauts back on the moon by 2024. But the rush may end up benefiting Russia.

To meet the deadline, some officials want to make agreements with America’s partners in the International Space Station to participate in the proposed lunar-orbiting Gateway station. Canada, Japan and the Europeans shouldn’t be a problem. Russia, on the other hand, not only is working with China on lunar efforts; its own...
description: In choosing a backup rocket provider, NASA should favor Musk over Moscow.
